thread.section_title: Dyers RV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dyers RV | dyersonline.com
thread.title: Benjamin Hobe
thread.title_full: Dyers RV reviewed by Benjamin Hobe

author: Benjamin Hobe
title: Benjamin Hobe
text:
I ordered a New 16ft. Awning material, it came in 2 days. It had wrinkles in the vinal, they got back to me the next day, they told me to keep the material, and sent a new awning replacement. Free of charge!! Now that is customer service!! They now have a new customer for life!
Ben H. Palm Springs, Ca.
